permissionsPopUp.title: Missing permissions
permissionsPopUp.message: Activate both Bluetooth and geolocation to detect devices.

connectionMessages.failed: Unable to connect to this device.

warningChannel.name: Exposure notifications (warning)
warningChannel.description: Get alerts when current PM values are above warning thresholds.

dangerChannel.name: Exposure notifications (danger)
dangerChannel.description: Get alerts when current PM values are above danger thresholds.

settings.description:
Here, you can specify warning and danger thresholds.
Received values lower than warning limit will be considered as normal, values superior to danger limit will be considered as dangerous.
settings.setTimeIntervalBody: Set which duration must pass before a new notification is sent.

warning.title: Warning threshold
warning.incorrect: Must be inferior than danger value.
warning.toastMessage: Warning value must be inferior to danger value.

danger.title: Danger threshold
danger.incorrect: Must be superior to warning value.
danger.toastMessage: Danger value must be superior to warning value.

endpointSelector.errorSnackbar: Unable to access new server, old config has been restored.

events.noEventsText: No events registered for this device.

endpointQRScanner.title: Scan QR code
endpointQRScanner.permissionRequired: Access to the camera permission is required.
endpointQRScanner.codeTypeError: You must to scan a QR code.
endpointQRScanner.codeDataError: Wrong format for the QR code data.
